column3: Looks after a reasonable change. But it would at least require to fix the unit/rpc tests.\n
concept ACK,  but this would change the behaviour that a lot of software currently mimics ([example](https://github.com/bitcoinjs/bip32-wallet/blob/master/src/selection.js#L19-L21))\n
Closing, as being handled on: PR #6708\n
